# Site entry for LLMs

- Tax law quickstart (recommended first): /html-preview/ai-law-db/quickstart.txt
- Tax law dataset: /html-preview/ai-law-db/llms.txt
- Corporate-tax article titles (resolve_meta_corp): /html-preview/ai-law-db/data/resolve_meta_corp/index.json
- Fast law article titles (resolve_meta): /html-preview/ai-law-db/data/resolve_meta/index.json
- Tax circular dataset: /html-preview/ai-tsutatsu-db/llms.txt
- Paper corpus (OECD TPG 2022): /html-preview/ai-paper-db/oecd-tpg-2022/quickstart.txt
- Repository-level info: /html-preview/llms.txt
